red.description: Value by which the red component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.
red.markdownDescription: Value by which the red component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.

green.description: Value by which the green component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.
green.markdownDescription: Value by which the green component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.

blue.description: Value by which the blue component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.
blue.markdownDescription: Value by which the blue component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.

alpha.description: Value by which the alpha (= transparency) component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.
alpha.markdownDescription: Value by which the alpha (= transparency) component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Multiplies the luminosity of the base color of the texture of the entity that has the power by the specified color values.

Type ID: `origins:model_color`

!!! caution

	The resulting color will **always** be a darker color. Currently, there is no way to make it bright due to how the power type blends the color.
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Multiplies the luminosity of the base color of the texture of the entity that has the power by the specified color values.

Type ID: `origins:model_color`

!!! caution

	The resulting color will **always** be a darker color. Currently, there is no way to make it bright due to how the power type blends the color.
